sourcesContent:
Cost Analysis

{results ? ( <>

Cost of Collisions Per Year

Total: ${Math.round(results.yearly?.total ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Direct Costs: ${Math.round(results.yearly?.direct ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Human Capital: ${Math.round(results.yearly?.humanCapital ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Willingness to Pay: ${Math.round(results.yearly?.wtp ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Cost of Collisions Per Day

Total: ${Math.round(results.daily?.total ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Direct Costs: ${Math.round(results.daily?.direct ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Human Capital: ${Math.round(results.daily?.humanCapital ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

Willingness to Pay: ${Math.round(results.daily?.wtp ?? 0).toLocaleString()}

) : (

Select an area to see the cost analysis.

)}
